links.title: Apple retail union organizers want workers to be paid at least $30 per hour
links.description: Workers who hope to organize a union at Apple's Grand Central Terminal store want workers to be paid a minimum of $30 per hour, according to a website for the group, Fruit Stand Workers United, that was updated on Monday.

Zoom Out:

We’ve only had 4 "big ones" in the last 100 yrs, where stocks dropped ~50% or more.

So ZOOM out folks!
